templates.name: The Hype Hook
templates.description: Standard Linear Flow - Best for prestigious companies or clear, strong job titles

sections.name: Company Intro
sections.description: Introduce the company in an engaging way that captures attention

sections.name: Role & Tech
sections.description: Describe the role and technologies involved in detail

sections.name: Requirements
sections.description: List what's needed to qualify for this role

sections.name: Compensation
sections.description: Reveal salary, benefits, and total compensation package

templates.name: The Bag Alert
templates.description: Compensation First - Best for jobs with high salaries or great benefits

sections.name: Compensation
sections.description: Lead with salary, benefits, and total compensation to grab attention

sections.name: Role & Tech
sections.description: Explain what the role entails and why it pays so well

sections.name: Requirements
sections.description: List the qualifications needed to get this high-paying role

sections.name: Company
sections.description: Reveal which company is offering this opportunity

templates.name: The Skill Check
templates.description: Challenge/Requirements First - Best for very hard and competitive jobs

sections.name: Requirements
sections.description: Start with the demanding requirements to set the bar high

sections.name: Company
sections.description: Reveal the prestigious company behind these high standards

sections.name: Role & Tech
sections.description: Describe what the actual work involves

sections.name: Compensation
sections.description: Show the compensation that matches this level of difficulty

templates.name: The Bed Rotter
templates.description: Remote Work Focus - Best for fully remote roles, digital nomad friendly, or jobs with flexible hours

sections.name: Location
sections.description: Lead with remote work, location flexibility, or work-from-anywhere benefits

sections.name: Role
sections.description: Describe what the role entails

sections.name: Pay
sections.description: Reveal compensation - emphasize earning money from anywhere

templates.name: The Moonshot
templates.description: Startup/Equity Focus - Best for AI Startups, Crypto, FinTech, or pre-IPO companies offering stock options

sections.name: The Mission
sections.description: Start with the company's mission, vision, and potential impact

sections.name: Equity
sections.description: Highlight stock options, equity packages, and potential upside

sections.name: The Role
sections.description: Describe how this role contributes to the mission

templates.name: The Baby Gronk
templates.description: Internship/Junior Role - Best for entry-level, internships, new grads, or 'No Experience' roles

sections.name: The Opportunity
sections.description: Emphasize that this is an entry point, no experience needed, learning opportunity

sections.name: Mentorship
sections.description: Highlight mentorship, training, growth opportunities, and support

sections.name: Perks
sections.description: Show the perks, benefits, and what makes it attractive for beginners

templates.name: The Rocket Ship
templates.description: Early-Stage Startup - Best for high-growth startups where the selling point is growth potential

sections.name: The Vibe
sections.description: Start with company culture, energy, fast-paced environment, and startup excitement

sections.name: The Equity
sections.description: Highlight equity packages and potential for significant upside

sections.name: The Role
sections.description: Describe the role and what you'll be building

sections.name: Requirements
sections.description: List what's needed - often more flexible for startups

templates.name: The Golden Handcuffs
templates.description: Big Tech / Corporate - Best for established corporations where the selling point is safety and perks, downside is boring work

sections.name: Perks/Lifestyle
sections.description: Lead with amazing benefits, work-life balance, stability, and perks

sections.name: Company Name
sections.description: Reveal the prestigious big tech or corporate name

sections.name: The Role
sections.description: Describe the role - may be more routine but stable

sections.name: Requirements
sections.description: List qualifications needed

templates.name: The Code Necromancer
templates.description: Legacy/Niche Firms - Best for banks, healthcare, or logistics firms with older tech stacks (Java, C++, .NET) where the selling point is job security and importance

sections.name: The Crisis
sections.description: Start with the critical importance of the systems, the problems they solve, or the impact

sections.name: The Skill
sections.description: Highlight the specialized/legacy tech skills needed (Java, C++, .NET, COBOL, etc.)

sections.name: The Reward
sections.description: Emphasize job security, stability, good pay, and long-term career

sections.name: Company
sections.description: Reveal the company and encourage application
